Cell.Data: To ensure that complete_instr is being covered
Checking if instrmem_rd is being covered
To ensure that any random PC is covered
Check that the ADD and AND instruction work in both modes
To see if the ALU opcode is being covered
To see if destination register is being covered
To see if first source register is being covered
To see if second source register is being covered
To see if imm5 bit is being covered
To check if NOT operation and SR1 register is being used
To see if mem opcode is being covered
To see if destination memory register is being covered
To see if source memory register is being covered
To see if base register is being covered
To see if PC Offset6 is being covered
To see if PC Offset9 field is being covered
To see if LD uses valid dr
To see if LD uses valid pcoffset9
To see if LDR uses valid dr
To see if LDR uses valid BaseR
To see if LDR uses valid pcoffset6
To see if LDI uses valid dr
To see if LDI uses valid pcoffset9

To see if STR uses correct baser
To see if STR uses the correct pcoffset6

To see if STI uses the correct pcoffset9

To see if BR instructions have all valid pcoffset9
Test with different kind of Arithmetric instructions
Test with different kind of Memory instructions
Test with different kind of Control instructions(Branch, Jump)
Test with all possible ALU, MEM, and CTRL instructions
"Ensure that all design units have 100% statement coverage 100% branch coverage"
